title: The Legacy
description: Amanda Chelsea vies to be a part of the Wynter Chelsea legacy where she'll fight the supernatural alongside the only two families that know of their existence. When the parents of both families go missing, Amanda is thrown into a world that she's not ready for. Hunting with her older brother and her best friend, she learns that the only thing harder than killing the supernatural is controlling her empathic ability. When a creature visits Amanda in her dreams, she realizes she must find her parents soon or risk her nightmares coming true.
author: Becca Ritchie
